attributes.action: No cuts to the Royal Family
attributes.additional_details:
Her Majesty and the Royal Family are at the top of the British Class system and are the greatest family in the country, securing the nation together and doing a tremendous amount of work for the country.

Her Majesty and the Royal Family are in their positions by Divine Right and deserve all privileges and finance.

This petition calls on the Chancellor of the Exchequer and the whole of Her Majesty's Government to not cut any finance and moneys to Her Majesty or the Royal Family.

Though this is a difficult economic situation for the United Kingdom, we should never cut moneys provided for the Royal Family or the Queen in anyway. If the Government has dignity and consideration for the Monarch they will not cut its finance.
